scripts.build-c: mkdir -p build; gcc c/main.c c/prime.c -o build/build-c
scripts.build-c-o3: mkdir -p build; gcc -O3 c/main.c c/prime.c -o build/build-c-o3
scripts.build-asm: emcc c/prime.c -o build/build-asm.js -O3 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS="['_nbOfPrimesFound']" --separate-asm -s ONLY_MY_CODE=1 && rm -f build/build-asm.js && node scripts/formatAsm.js build/build-asm.asm.js && echo Done
scripts.serve: cp -f public/worker.js public/index.html public/plain-javascript.js build && ./node_modules/.bin/pushstate-server build 8080
